pr_title: Add info logging for Job failure and cancellation

timeline.message: Add info logging for Job failure and cancellation

timeline.bodyText: should this be LOG.error? Also, is there something in TaskInfo info that would be useful to print to the log?
timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: There is a LOG.info of when the job starts that contains more details. Job failing is actually fairly frequent enough that info log is okay.
replies.author: bradyoo

timeline.bodyText: Maybe this should be warn? Also, is there something in TaskInfo info that would be useful to print to the log?
timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: I also think info here is fine. Also we have a Job Start info log that lets you know about some of the details for cross referencing.
replies.author: bradyoo
